Detailed Description

Procedures for the Tracker Reconstruction.

Date:
2008/02/16 AO First version

2008/02/21 AO BuildTrClusters(), BuildTrRecHits()

2008/02/24 AO BuildPatterns(), some bug fixed

2008/02/26 AO BuildTrTracks()

2008/02/28 AO Bug fixing

2008/03/11 AO Some change in clustering methods

2008/06/19 AO Updating TrCluster building

2008/07/01 PZ Global review and various improvements

Date
2008/10/28 18:31:30

Revision
1.8
